creditline: Gift of Vanessa Laird and Timothy Raylor
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: front view of dancing figure wearing headdress with long brown fur and grey horns; figure holds a bowl with two figures in PL hand and a rattle in right hand; skirt with stylized lizards (?) with zigzagging arrowheaded tongues; moccasins with black collars trimmed in white; grey, white, black, tan and shades of brown
title: Buffalo Dancer
